section01.title: About the Blockchain Olympiad
section01.contentHTML: The Hong Kong BlockChain OLympiad (HK-BCOL) invites current and recent students to solve real-world problems with decentralized applications, built with blockchain or distributed ledger technology. Top scoring projects proceed to the International BlockChain OLympiad (IBCOL) in July 2020.
